00020 
00021 /*
00022         Design Pattern Used: Chain of Responsibility
00023         Class: Dissector
00024         Handles Dissection of a packet at a level lower than TCP/UDP.
00025         Calls on the Cajun Parser that reads in an input file.
00026         Calls on Instruction objects to Interpret() a packet.
00027 */
00028 
00029 
00030 namespace BabelShark
00031 {
00032         class Dissector
00033         {
00034                 public:
00035             Dissector(const char* inFile, int* proto);
00036             ~Dissector();
00037 
00038             void Dissect(tvbuff_t *tvb, packet_info *pinfo, proto_tree *tree);
00039             void Test();
00040 
00041             void ReparseTree(const char* inFile);
00042 
00043                 private:
00044             Instruction* _RootInstruction;
00045             int*         _proto;
00046             gint**       _ett;
00047             std::string  _protoName;
00048             bool         _nameChanged;
00049         };
00050 }
00051 
00052 #endif //DISSECTOR_H
